data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: If you could travel to any time period from the past, what time period would you choose? Explain what is important about that time period to you.
data.answer: If I could travel to the past and I could choose the time and location, I would like to go back to the age of 18. Because back then I made a very stupid decision, and I really hope to have a second chance to change that decision. During that time period, I was in a very difficult situation to choose either to go to college or to get a job. In the end, I decided to quit high school before graduation and started to work in a cafe. If I could choose again, I would definitely continue my education instead of getting a low-skilled job. If I could have graduated from high school, my life might have turned out in a completely different way.
